text:
directed or undirected? And what kind of random graph? and what should be the distribution of the weights?

You could
• generate an unweighted random graph and then convert that to a weighted graph
• use `sprand` or `sprandn` from `SparseArrays` to generate a random matrix - but then you need to ensure that the diagonals are zero & that the matrix is symmetric in the undirected case

text: How could I convert an unweighted erdos-renyi graph to a weighted graph?
